title.value: Learning tabu search algorithms: A scheduling application
title.justification: The title clearly states the focus on learning tabu search algorithms applied to scheduling.
title.quote: Learning tabu search algorithms: A scheduling application

extractions.description: This paper presents a learning algorithm for improving tabu search by reducing its search space and evaluation effort. The learning mechanism employs classification methods to guide search space exploration, evaluated in the context of a physician scheduling problem.

type.justification: The paper involves practical experimentation and comparison of the proposed algorithm with existing techniques, which indicates empirical research.
type.quote: The main objective of this paper is to demonstrate that metaheuristics, particularly tabu search, can behave more intelligently and efficiently by gathering and using the data generated during the search process.

name.justification: The paper focuses on improving a specific metaheuristic, tabu search, using learning algorithms.
name.quote: Metaheuristics provide efficient approaches for many combinatorial problems.

name.justification: The paper incorporates machine learning techniques into the tabu search metaheuristic.
name.quote: These techniques facilitate a better exploration of the search space, and are capable of finding solutions that are unattainable without these learning algorithms.

name.justification: The application domain of the research is a scheduling problem.
name.quote: We propose a novel learning tabu search algorithm using classification methods in the context of a physician scheduling problem.

name.justification: This is the novel algorithm proposed by the paper, integrating machine learning methods into tabu search.
name.quote: We propose a novel learning tabu search algorithm using classification methods in the context of a physician scheduling problem.

is_contributed.justification: The Learning Tabu Search algorithm is introduced by the authors as a new contribution.
is_contributed.quote: We propose a novel learning tabu search algorithm using classification methods.

is_executed.justification: The paper discusses the execution of the algorithm within the experiments conducted.
is_executed.quote: The experimental results demonstrate the benefit of using a learning mechanism under stochastic conditions.

is_compared.justification: The learning algorithm is compared to enhanced tabu search and other methods in the experiments.
is_compared.quote: The learning tabu search is compared to an enhanced version of tabu search.

referenced_paper_title.justification: There isn't a specific referenced paper for the introduction of the Learning Tabu Search as it is a novel contribution by the authors.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We propose a novel learning tabu search algorithm.
